TopicTitle: float curve calculator in a spreadsheet?

Articles.Content: I was bored, and thought I'd make a little spreadsheet to calculate a bunch of parameters for planes like maximum sustained turn performance, climb rate, stall speed, etc. FAR is doing the heavy lifting, because it calculates Cl and Cd, but I also need to calculate thrust available, thus this thread. I use google sheets, and I haven't done this before.
